pages.text: Trade with the Archeologist Villager until you unlock the final Master Level trade, Map to Chappa'ai.
X on the map marks the spot, dig down and find a structure inside which the Buried Stargate is sealed.
On top of the Buried Stargate, there should be a Cartouche that holds the Address to Abydos (You can right-click on it to get the address as a string of numbers). Take it with you, you will need it.
